articles.content: Can the chill in the air, snow-peaked mountain range, quaint rural setting, a modest stadium complex with Victorian touch make Dharamsala seem like England? Those dealing with confusion over geograph… [+5869 chars]

articles.author: The Quint
articles.title: 2024 Olympics: India Placed in Pool B of Men’s Hockey, To Begin Campaign vs NZ - The Quint
articles.description: 2024 Paris Olympics: The pools for the men’s hockey competition at the 2024 Paris Olympics were revealed on Wednesday, with the Indian team placed in Group B, where they will be up against Belgium, Australia, Argentina, New Zealand and Ireland.
articles.content: Indias third match will be played on 30 July, against the comparatively weakest team on paper in Pool B Ireland. Albeit, Craig Fultons team will have a challenging end to their pool-stage campaign, a… [+705 chars]
